name: MetLife, Inc.
description: MetLife, Inc. is one of the largest global providers of insurance, annuities, and employee benefit programs. Established in 1868, MetLife has a long-standing history of serving customers with innovative financial solutions tailored to meet their evolving needs. The company operates in more than 40 countries, providing a wide range of insurance products including life, health, property, and casualty insurance. MetLife is dedicated to helping individuals and businesses navigate their financial journeys, offering products that support financial security and peace of mind. The company is also known for its commitment to corporate social responsibility, focusing on areas such as community engagement, environmental sustainability, and promoting diversity and inclusion in the workplace. With a strong emphasis on customer service, MetLife utilizes advanced technologies to enhance the customer experience and streamline their services. The company’s mission is to build a more confident future for its customers and communities by providing quality financial protection and solutions.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

seo.meta_title: MetLife, Inc. | Insurance and Financial Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore MetLife, Inc., a leading global provider of insurance and financial services. Learn about our innovative products and commitment to customer service.

faq.question: What services does MetLife offer?
faq.answer: MetLife offers a range of services including life insurance, health insurance, property and casualty insurance, and employee benefits.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of MetLife?
faq.answer: Michel Khalaf is the CEO of MetLife, Inc.

faq.question: Where is MetLife headquartered?
faq.answer: MetLife is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.
